# Tutorial

# Import Code
```

```

# Installation
In Streamer.bot in select `Import` from the top left.
Copy the `Import Code` and paste it into the `Import String`.

You will need to update, the FetchUrl Sub-Action with your own Channel ID, to get this go onto Youtube then visit Settings, and Advanced Settings. The Channel ID should be there now copy and replace the text in there (everything after the `?id=`)

# Configuration
You can edit what the Output message is to a degree, the fetchUrl Subaction will always return the title and link to your video, under the argument `%latestvid%` however after that you can change what you want.

You can have this triggered by a command or via a timed action.
